title: Calories in One Tortilla
meta_description: Discover calories in one tortilla, including carbs, protein, fat, full nutrition breakdown per serving, and easy tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Standard 6-inch (45 g) flour tortilla, plain, no fillings or added fats; values based on average commercial product.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by type (flour vs. corn), size, brand, and preparation; check labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One standard flour tortilla has about 140 kcal, mostly from carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one flour tortilla?
faqs.a: About 140 kcal for a standard 6-inch flour tortilla.

faqs.q: What's the carb content in one tortilla?
faqs.a: Roughly 24 g carbs, with 1 g fiber and 1 g sugars.

faqs.q: Are corn tortillas lower in calories than flour?
faqs.a: Yes, a similar-sized corn tortilla has about 80 kcal.

faqs.q: Does tortilla size affect calorie count?

faqs.q: How much sodium is in one tortilla?
faqs.a: Around 250 mg, varying by brand and if salted.
